::KitKat::

She walked into a conference room and sat down. She motioned for 
Apocalypse to have a seat next to her. "I can see that you are strong 
and that you are an exceptional warrior."  She looked down and 
sighed. "Destructor will be missed. I considered him a friend." She 
looked back up at him. "Why did you kill him?"

She knew that a leader shouldn't show weakness with emotions, but she 
felt his loss. She would miss him and his friendship.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Apocalypse was surprised at her lack of interest in the death of 
destructor. 
> He walked with kit kat to the place of her designation.
